descriptopn.short: "Mahjong Kitchen" is a variation of the classic Chinese puzzle game of finding pairs of symbols within the allotted time, on a playing field that increases with each level.
description.long:
Mahjong Kitchen is a variation of the classic Chinese symbol matching puzzle game.
In this variation, the level must be completed within the allotted time.
With each new level the size of the playing field increases.
Passing a level can be made easier by using boosters: an extra minute, a hint.
Boosters can be purchased using points earned.
The shape of the playing field adapts to the device screen.
description.instructions:
Find a pair of identical icons that can be connected by one, two or three straight lines.
When all pairs have been found, the level will end.
If you do not meet the deadline within the allotted time, the points collected are NOT written off (they can be used to purchase boosters)
